metadata.title: CVE-2021-39802 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In change_pte_range of mprotect.c , there is a possible way to make ashared mmap writable due to a permissions bypass. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-213339151References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
